content: I'm still deciding between those two bags, but I think I'll try to visit a camera store to see them in person before making a decision. By the way, I've also been thinking about getting a new tripod to replace my old Manfrotto BeFree, which is showing some signs of wear and tear. Do you have any recommendations for a sturdy and durable tripod that can support my Nikon D5600 and lenses?
